attributes.name: Key Features
attributes.description:
Generate in bullet format all the features of this product that make this product useful, playful or fun e.g. gameplay, characters, design etc. The bullets should follow the following requirements: 
1) Each bullet should very succinct. Do not elaborate on the benefits. 
2) Please write everything in English. 
3) Provide the height of this product if the product is a action figure, plush toy, soft toy, playset. Always convert any dimensions into centimeters i.e. if the value is in feet, inches then convert it to centimeters. If the value is more than 100cm then provide the converted value in meters.
4) Please ensure the age related information is mentioned only in the last bullet point e.g. "Suitable for ages x and above". For all age information which falls less than 3 years, always convert it to months. For all age information 36 months and above, aways convert it to years. If no age information is found in source text do not mention age suitability.

attributes.description: A detailed description helps shoppers understand what your product offers, reducing the need for enquiry and encourage more confident purchases. It also should convince customers of the product’s value by explaining how the product stands out from competitors, without overpromising. Shopee supports only Plain Text. Including emojis is possible.

attributes.description: Indicates the descriptive term that is used to indicate what the bundled product's price standard for, and what the buyer would get in a successful transaction for the product price. Example: 5 x 125g indicates the buyer will get 5 items containing 125g of the product per item, for a given price.

attributes.name: Product Description (Original)
attributes.placeHolder: Describe product features and benefits in plain text. E.g. Nothing satisfies your craving like the crunch of Tortilla Chips. They are loaded with spice at just the right heat to excite.
attributes.description: A comprehensive and enticing narrative that vividly describes the features, benefits, and unique selling points of the product. Crafted specifically for e-commerce platforms, the product description serves as a powerful tool to captivate page visitors and influence their decision to add the product to their cart. By providing detailed insights and showcasing the value the product brings, this description enhances the user's understanding and creates a compelling case for making a purchase.

Analyse the product Image for detailed product attributes.
分析產品圖片以獲取詳細的產品屬性。

attributes.description: Analyze the product image and in a table format, provide details about 1) The type of clothing e.g. skirt, top 2) Pocket information including how many pockets and where they are positioned i.e. front, side or back 3) Sleeve length i.e. long, short or mid-length or none if there are no pockets 4) Print or pattern type 5) Color or colours of the product 6) Neck type, for example, round, v-neck or button 7) Closure such as buttons or zips. Please present the information in a table format. Column 1 should contain the attribute, and column 2 the response. Separating the attribute and the response should be a |. Please structure the table with equal formatting and structure so it is easily read. Please provide as much information as possible when analyzing the image. If information about the product cannot be scrapped, then please do not show this table.
